item.title: Making Obsidian Talk with Google's Fancy Wavenet Voices
item.description: Making Obsidian Talk with Google’s Fancy Wavenet Voices: A Quick Hack I’m sharing a neat little hack I put together. As a hardcore Obsidian user, I was getting frustrated with the available text-to-speech options. I really wanted to use Google’s Wavenet voices because they sound amazing, but couldn’t find a plugin that did exactly what I wanted. So I sorted it out myself. The Problem Sometimes you want your notes read back to you while you’re doing other stuff (yes, I’m quite the couch potato).
